Just wondering, is there a reason why vanilla KSP doesn't display your current Delta v that you have left on the ship?

Edited December 18, 2014 by Eagle21221

It hasn't been implemented yet. With the Beta release Squad as implemented a large majority of the features that will be present in the final game, but they are far from done. Now the focus switches from feature/part implementation to bug-fixing and polishing. Be patient and I'm sure it will get implemented eventually. If you don't want to wait there is always VOID and KER (Linked for your convenience)
